p: The pancreatic enzyme activity was measured as described in detail by Pruszyńska-Oszmalek et al. [ 18]. In brief, 250 μL of phosphate buffer solution (PBS) was added to 100 mg of content, and the mixture was homogenised on ice and centrifuged (10,000× g for 16 min). The activity of lipase, amylase and trypsin of the duodenal digesta was measured using appropriate commercial colorimetric assay kits (BioVision, Milpitas, CA, USA).
